verses.verse: In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Once <S%G4218><s%> Ye Walked <S%G4043><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Age <S%G165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2889><s%> Of This World, <S%G5127><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ruler <S%G758><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Air, <S%G109><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Works <S%G1754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Disobedience : <S%G543><s%>

Among <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Had Our Conduct <S%G390><s%> Once <S%G4218><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Desires <S%G1939><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Our, <S%G2257><s%> Doing <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Things Willed <S%G2307><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Thoughts, <S%G1271><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1510><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> By Nature, <S%G5449><s%> Of Wrath, <S%G3709><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest : <S%G3062><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But God, <S%G2316><s%> Rich <S%G4145><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Mercy, <S%G1656><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Wherewith <S%G3739><s%> He Loved <S%G25><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%>

Also <S%G2532><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> We <S%G2248><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Offences, <S%G3900><s%> Quickened Us With <S%G4806><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> By Grace <S%G5485><s%> Ye Are <S%G2075><s%> Saved, <S%G4982><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Raised Us Up Together, <S%G4891><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seated Us Together <S%G4776><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenlies <S%G2032><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Shew <S%G1731><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> That Are <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G1904><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Surpassing <S%G5235><s%> Riches <S%G4149><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5485><s%> Of His Grace <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Kindness <S%G5544><s%> ' Toward <S%G1909><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> By Grace <S%G5485><s%> Ye Are <S%G2075><s%> Saved <S%G4982><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith; <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Yourselves; It Is <S%G5216><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Gift; <S%G1435><s%>
Not <S%G3756><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Works, <S%G2041><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Might Boast. <S%G2744><s%>

<S%G846><s%> For His <S%G1063><s%> We Are <S%G2070><s%> Workmanship, <S%G4161><s%> Created <S%G2936><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Before Prepared <S%G4282><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> We Should Walk. <S%G4043><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Remember <S%G3421><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Once <S%G4218><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Called <S%G3004><s%> Uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Made By Hand <S%G5499><s%>

That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Were <S%G2258><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2540><s%> That Time <S%G1565><s%> Apart From <S%G5565><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Alienated From <S%G526><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Commonwealth <S%G4174><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Strangers <S%G3581><s%> From The <S%G3588><s%> Covenants <S%G1242><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Promise, <S%G1860><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Without God <S%G112><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World; <S%G2889><s%>

<S%G3570><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Once <S%G4218><s%> Were <S%G5607><s%> Afar Off <S%G3112><s%> Near <S%G1451><s%> Are Become <S%G1096><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

<S%G846><s%> For He <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1515><s%> Our Peace, <S%G2257><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Both <S%G297><s%> One, <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Middle Wall <S%G3320><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fence <S%G5418><s%> Broke Down, <S%G3089><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Enmity <S%G2189><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4561><s%> His Flesh, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Commandments <S%G1785><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Decrees <S%G1378><s%> Having Annulled, <S%G2673><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> He Might Create <S%G2936><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> Making <S%G4160><s%> Peace; <S%G1515><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Might Reconcile <S%G604><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Both <S%G297><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God <S%G2316><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cross, <S%G4716><s%> Having Slain <S%G615><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Enmity <S%G2189><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> It; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> He Announced The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Who Were <S%G3588><s%> Afar Off <S%G3112><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Those <S%G3588><s%> Near. <S%G1451><s%>

So <S%G686><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> Are Ye <S%G2075><s%> Strangers <S%G3581><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sojourners, <S%G3941><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Fellow Citizens <S%G4847><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The Household <S%G3609><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%>

Being Built Up <S%G2026><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Foundation <S%G2310><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> Being The <S%G5607><s%> Cornerstone <S%G204><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Building <S%G3619><s%> Fitted Together <S%G4883><s%> Increases <S%G837><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A Temple <S%G3485><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Are Being Built Together <S%G4925><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Habitation <S%G2732><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
